allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add comprehensive Moku platform support (Lab, Pro, Delta)

Major platform additions:
- Add MokuLabPlatform (2 slots, 2 I/O, 500 MHz, no DIO)
- Add MokuProPlatform (4 slots, 4 I/O, 1.25 GHz, no DIO)
- Add MokuDeltaPlatform (3 slots, 8 I/O, 5 GHz, 32 DIO)

Documentation improvements:
- Add CLAUDE.md for AI assistant context
- Add llms.txt for LLM discoverability
- Add comprehensive platform specs in docs/MOKU_PLATFORM_SPECIFICATIONS.md
- Include official datasheets (Go, Lab, Pro, Delta)
- Update README with all platforms and usage examples

Platform specifications:
- Detailed ADC/DAC specs from official datasheets
- Voltage ranges, impedance, and bandwidth documented
- DIO header support (Go: 16 pins, Delta: 32 pins, Lab/Pro: none)
- Delta modeled in 3-slot standard mode (better sampling rates)

)")
